GSD.product_version: versions from v4.19 to before v4.19.247
GSD.description:
drm/vc4: txp: Don't set TXP_VSTART_AT_EOF

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.247 by commit bb59345bb77591d66089cc2d8050ba82ecb41b32, it was introduced in version v4.19 by commit 008095e065a85a13ffb41b9c98149456267c30b8. For more details please see the references link.
